= ipt_account patches =

Here you can find newest (and some older) '''ipt_account''' patches. You need both, kernel and iptables patches. You can find installation guide [wiki:Installation here].

Currenly there are two stable versions of '''ipt_account:''' version '''0.1.20''' (with time={src,dst,any} feature) and version '''0.1.21''' (with show={src,dst,src-or-dst,dst-or-src} and reset-on-read features). Differences between these two versions was described in usage guide [wiki:Usage here].
